A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: In what universe did the critics see The Last Jedi? The movie I saw was horrible. It was a slap in the face to the fans. It was nothing but \"gotcha\" moments\, bad humor\, miscast actors and actors that just can't act\, pointless characters\, irrelevant scenes\, and a huge letdown of an ending.   I would love to ask the director if he had even seen Star Wars before making this.  Go see it for yourself but you've been warned. Oh...and the name of the movie isn't even accurate.
